answers.answer: Your worries are without merit on both accounts as there are plenty of men with diabetes who have children and i am one. Many women over thirty have children without complications. Both my children were conceived and born after my wife was thirty two aand about ten years after i became diabetic. There are other drugs and things to try for conception and the doctor who prescribed the clomid should be consulted for another prescrption to try. Good luck, babies are the most fun you can have in your life. bret

title: diabetic men and child birth
